meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>commandment</kanji> is <kanji>announce</kanji>d to you, but you should take it more as an <vocabulary>admonition</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>warning</vocabulary>. You're an adult after all, so people don't get to command you around.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
